features: 【FULLY ADJUSTABLE DESIGN】-Designed with 7 back positions to meet all your needs when doing workouts, you can perform a number of upper and lower body exercises while incorporating dumbbell use to hit goals and build/maintain muscle.
【HEAVY-DUTY STEEL CONSTRUCTION】- The adjustable dumbbells bench designed with unique triangle structure and heavy-duty thickened steel, 500 lbs weight capacity , no worry for stability.
【COMFORTABLE & ERGONOMIC DESIGN】- With high-density foam padding and seat secure body firmly and reduce muscle fatigue when you do full body workout.

【EASY ASSEMBLE】- PASYOU Weight Bench is almost full assembled, you only need to assemble the front and back support tube and the foam rollers, it is very easy and only takes 2 minutes.The Foldable Workout Bench easily for quick storage.it saves space when folded.

【NO WORRY】- Package included installation tools.If you have any quality problem whthin one year,you can contact with us at any time.24/7 customer support, solving your problem in time. 100% satisfying solutions if any issues!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PASYOU Adjustable Weight Bench - Utility Workout Bench, Full Body Workout for Home Gym

REAL 500 POUNDS CAPACITY - Build with Stable Structure and Superior Quality Material 1.5MM Thickened Steel Material Builds with stable triangular structure, 1.5mm thickened steel material, and dual anti-slip stabilizers, this pasyou weight bench is super sturdy and will keep stable during workout. What's more, there are 4 end-cups for adjusting the stablizers height to keep the bench level on diferrent ground. High-density Seat & Backrest Cushion Conserding the product durability and customers' comfort experience are both indispensable, Pasyou workout benches use high density foam cushion, which are combined with several levels of different materials together to make sure it is not only breathable and comfortable, but also have a long life time. Dual Support for Greater Performance Not only designed with ankle support foams, this exercise bench is also desgined with a pair of knee support foams. The double protection can provide users more comfortable experience and stronger support strength. A great choice for home gym, suit for beginners to enthusiast.

PASYOU PA300 FID WEIGHT BENCH - 8 Positions to Fulfill Different Workout Demands Support Full Body Workouts This pasyou PA300 fitness bench support users to perform most of upper and lower body exercises to hit the goals or maintain muscle: Chest Workouts: Such as flat bench press, incline bench press etc.Shoulder and Arm Workouts: Such as seated overhead press, one-arm dumbbell lateral raise etc.Ab Workouts: Such as abdominal curl, reverse curls, lying leg raise etc.Back Workouts: Such as one-arm dumbbell row, hyper-extension, reverse fly etc.Thighs Workouts: Such as seated calf raises, dumbbell one-Leg calf raise etc.Buttocks Workouts: Such as glute bridge, reverse hyperextension etc.
COMPACT & FOLDABLE - Suit for Home Gym Perfectly, Save MORE Space
What is in the Package? Fully Consider for Users - 90% Pre Assembled and Come with Workout Guide

SPECIFICATION Model PASYOU PA300 Weight Capacity 500 lbs, about 226 kg Flat Size 55 x 15.75 x 20 inches (L x W x H) Fold Size 35.4 x15.75 x10 inches Backrest Size 29.5 x 12.2 x 2.35 inches Seat Size 14 x 12.2 x 2.35 inches Backrest Adjustments 8 Levels ( Include incline, flat and decline positions) Support Foams 2 pairs of support foams for both ankle and knee How to Assemble Almost full-assembled, only need assemble 2 foot stabilizers and insert 2 lockpin on the bench How to Fold Only need to pull out the 2 lockpin, then fold to store How to Adjust Lift to Adjust: lift the back support tube and then put it to the level you want, super easy and no hassle Package Included PA300 weight bench, tool, manual, workout guide paper PASYOU's Promise 1-year FREE replacement parts! 24/7 Responsible professional response! 100% Satisfying Solutions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only folds to 9.5”
reviews.reviewText: Great bench for the money. Arrived quickly, easy to put on several parts, all pieces included , even a hex wrench. Took maybe 5 minutes to assemble. Very stable bench, light weight, great slant board adjuster, very stout. Only problem for me is, will not fit under my bed. Minimum width is around 9.5”. Great bench , especially considering that it costs less than $100.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the money
reviews.reviewText: I looked for a used bench with the same features and they were only a little cheaper than this one. It is really easy to put together…maybe 15 min to unpack and have together. Very sturdy. Fold up easily so that is a plus. Adjustment knobs are spring loaded over screws for convenience and screw in to secure.. I got the newer version. It was 30.00 more than the older one. Not sure what the differences are, with exception of increased weight capacity. Either way…still very cheap for a folding bench with this level of adjustment and capacity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: so far this bench has been great. no problems putting it together by myself. heavy, but not so heavy you can't move it around if you need to. i'm F 5'7" 140 lbs.....trying to drop that number down, hence the purchase of this bench. :-) My only reason for dinging it one start is because the pins that hold the legs in place are very very loose. the first time i put the bench together and moved it into place, the pins were starting to come out. i just fixed it by putting black duct tape over the pins so they wouldn't slide out. they are still strong and hold the bench together, just slip out very easily if not taped down.now, if only this bench would magically make my muscles grow just by looking at it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sturdy budget bench
reviews.reviewText: Bench feels very sturdy, no wobble, no sharp edges, cushions are comfortable, quick to adjust angle. Only minor complaints are when you make it completely flat the gap between the seat and the backrest is pretty big and kind of uncomfortable on the lower back. And the feet at the front are a bit far forward which kind of get in the way so you have to put the weights further in front of you and reach further to pick them up off the floor which is also not great for the lower back.But overall extremely good value since the materials are good quality it should last pretty much forever so definitely worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, well made
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for exercises that I can't do on my bow flex bench. It comes with everything to assemble, husband put it together in 10 minutes, Includes a sheet of exercises for upper, abs and lower body. Happy with it so far. I am putting it to the test with every other day weight training.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Defective product. - UPDATED! Good Customer service, problem resolved!
reviews.reviewText: The product came with a hole-like defect on the top of the bench.Everything else is ok.UPDATE:After seeing my review on the product, their customer service got to work with me on this problem and ended up offering me a win-win resolution for this issue.After all, I am satisfied with the way they handled the product problems. I think they are a reliable seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PA 400 is solid so far
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to assemble, it’s easy to move and fold up. I am 5’11” and fit on the bench with no problems. It’s wide enough and long enough. The leg holders are comfortable for me for ab work. I’ve used it 4 times and been happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value and durability for its price
reviews.reviewText: The ease of use and adjustability of this bench can't be overstated. The quick and simple adjustments allow for seamless transitions between exercises, maximizing my workout efficiency. The smooth and secure locking mechanisms ensure that the bench remains stable and secure throughout my entire workout, providing a sense of confidence and peace of mind.Furthermore, the compact design of this adjustable weight bench is a major advantage, especially for those with limited space. It can be easily folded and stored away when not in use, making it ideal for home gyms or smaller workout areas. The space-saving design does not compromise on functionality or performance, making it a practical choice for fitness enthusiasts of all levels.
The price was right and the bench is nice and sturdy. Very easy to put together and easy to adjust. I’m happy with this purchase.

I needed a bench that would EASILY fold away quickly but be sturdy enough to handle a variety of workout positions. This thing is awesome. Easy to put away/put together, sturdy, very well-cushioned and comfortable, has all the adjustments I need. So much better than those really plasticy benches that fold up.Worth the price!
Ottima, perfetta nei materiali e nella qualità costruttiva. Ottima imbottitura. Nel kit sono presenti gli attrezzi per assemblarla velocemente. Imballo perfetto. La consiglio al 100%.

Il est facile et rapide à monter et semble de suite assez solide.Je l'utilise maintenant depuis 1 mois à raison de 4 séances par semaine et aucun regret, la solidité de la structure comme du matériau de revêtement se confirme, il est facile à manipuler pour les différentes inclinaisons comme pour le replier et le ranger.Les dimensions sont agréables tant en longueur qu'en largeur.A voir sur la durée, mais je ne suis pas inquiète, je suis ravie de mon achat.

Très facile à monter, un banc d'une qualité supérieure pour un prix raisonnable.Convient à utilisation personnelle mais attention à bien manipuler et ne pas oublier de bien resserrer la manivelle à chaque changement de positon.Seul bémol est qu'il faut effectivement dévisser et revisser (à la main) la manivelle, ce qui d'un côté, assure un bon maintien du siège en positon mais qui prend également du temps. 30-45 secondes pour changer le banc de position.Les roulette à l'arrière sont un vrai plus étant donné qu'il est assez lourd.Fournis avec un fiche d'exemple d'entrainement, c'est pas grand chose mais l'intention fait plaisir.
